summary: An independent financial condition report prepared by Macalvins Limited for Ghislaine Maxwell's legal team, covering the period 2015-2020. It details her assets, net worth, financial transfers, and addresses government allegations about asset alienation, concluding her net worth was approximately $22.5 million as of October 2020, with no significant unexplained transfers in the reviewed period.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The central subject of the financial condition report detailing her assets, net worth, and financial transactions from 2015-2020. The report was prepared in connection with her criminal proceedings.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned in the context of government allegations regarding substantial financial transfers between his accounts and Ghislaine Maxwell's accounts during the 2007-2011 period.

persons.name: Spouse of Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Ghislaine Maxwell's husband, whom she married in 2016. He provided documentation and confirmation for the financial report, and assets were transferred into a trust he controls.

connections.description: Married in 2016, filed joint US tax returns from 2016 onward, and Ghislaine Maxwell transferred the majority of her assets into a trust controlled by her spouse.
Historical financial transfers between their accounts during 2007-2011, with Ghislaine Maxwell acting as an officer for corporate entities related to Epstein's aircraft and air travel.

events.title: Sale of New York City Property
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell sold a residential property in New York City for $15,075,000. The proceeds were tracked and deposited.

events.title: Marriage and Asset Transfer
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell married her spouse and transferred the majority of her assets into a trust controlled by him.

events.title: Dissolution of Terramar Charities
events.description: Terramar Project Inc and Terramar UK, charities founded by Ghislaine Maxwell, ceased operations and were dissolved.

events.title: Preparation of Financial Condition Report
events.description: Macalvins Limited was engaged to prepare a financial condition report for Ghislaine Maxwell for the period 2015-2020, in the context of her criminal proceedings.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell's net worth was approximately $20.2 million in January 2015 and approximately $22.5 million as of October 31, 2020, which included about $7.67 million in advance legal retainer fees.
The report states there was no alienation of assets from 2015-2020 beyond ordinary family expenditure and substantial legal defense costs, countering government allegations.
In 2016, Ghislaine Maxwell transferred the majority of her assets into a trust controlled by her spouse, with whom she filed joint tax returns.
The financial review found no transfers from Jeffrey Epstein to Ghislaine Maxwell or vice versa during the 2015-2020 period, unlike the earlier 2007-2011 period referenced by the government.

The report acknowledges limitations, including an inability to perform a full audit due to the Covid-19 pandemic and Ghislaine Maxwell's detention conditions, and reliance on information provided by her and her spouse.
